trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestisce l'evento **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** di una classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegato è definito per il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento del <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento del <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> classe specificando una subroutine denominata **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento viene generato durante il <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> costruisce una <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> mediante l'oggetto corrente dell'oggetto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> e lo passa al **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> oggetto fornito per il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento per impostare il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> su un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> proprietà durante il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** viene utilizzato l'evento, l'identità fornita dal ticket di autenticazione form nel cookie o URL.

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** è solo l'evento generato quando l'autenticazione <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> è impostato su <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> e <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> è un modulo HTTP attivo per l'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object with a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice viene illustrato come utilizzare il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento per impostare il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> per un <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> oggetto con un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
